ch.unibas.bsc.detapp.utilities

Class LineChartWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.unibas.bsc.detapp.utilities.LineChartWrapper

  • public class LineChartWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class for managing LineCharts.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LineChartWrapper(com.github.mikephil.charting.charts.LineChart lineChart, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> counterList, java.lang.String sensorPosition)
      A LineChartWrapper reduces the amount of duplicate code when using LineCharts.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LineChartWrapper

        public LineChartWrapper(com.github.mikephil.charting.charts.LineChart lineChart,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> counterList,
                        java.lang.String sensorPosition)
        A LineChartWrapper reduces the amount of duplicate code when using LineCharts. Use this constructor to create a LineChart where the data points start at and are labeled with
        Parameters:
        lineChart - LineChart object
        counterList - List of counters. For each counter, a new LineDataSet is created and colored
        sensorPosition - Position of the sensor as string which is shown on the top right corner

    • Method Detail

        Use this method when displaying data
        Parameters:
        measurement - Measured value by sensor.

      • addEntrySecondDataset

        public void addEntrySecondDataset(java.lang.Long measurement)
        Use this method when displaying data in a second dataset
        Parameters:
        measurement - Measured value by sensor.

      • notifyLiveDataChanged

        public void notifyLiveDataChanged()
        Refresh charts by notifying about data changes first and trigger reloading.
